description: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1 and for n > 1, if n is k-th ludic number larger than 1 [i.e., n = A003309(k+1)], a(n) = nthprime(a(k)), otherwise, when n is k-th nonludic number [i.e., n = A192607(k)], a(n) = nthcomposite(a(k)), where nthcomposite = A002808, nthprime = A000040.
